p: Hu et al. [ 52] identified 34 different phenolic acid derivatives, such as gallotannins and quercetin, and, for the first time, identified rosmarinic acid in mango pulp using UPLC-ESI-QTOFMS. Ramirez et al. [ 53] identified mangiferin, homomangiferin, and dimethyl mangiferin in the pulp of Tommy Atkins and Pica varieties. Mangiferin is a yellow crystal that chemically belongs to the xanthone family. Mangiferin is known for its pharmacological activities, including anticancer, antimicrobial, anti-atherosclerotic, antiallergenic, anti-inflammatory, analgesic, and immunomodulatory activities [ 26, 54, 55, 56, 57].
